channel.title: os x on here, take this fix
channel.description: Recent content in os x on here, take this fix

item.title: install emacs and doom-emacs on os x catalina with brew
item.description: You have already installed brew, now you install the emacs cask. brew cask install emacs Next open and close emacs so it creates ~/.emacs.d, then install doom-emacs. git clone https://github.com/hlissner/doom-emacs ~/.emacs.d ~/.emacs.d/bin/doom install After install, configure and enable modules you need. Put this on your ~/.doom.d/config.el so you will be able to insert special characters with the right option key. ;; I need my Spanish Ã±. (setq mac-right-option-modifier nil)

item.title: keepassxc crash on catalina update
item.description: Application crashes immediately upon launch. A system dialog is opened. Process: KeePassXC [5529] Path: /Applications/KeePassXC.app/Contents/MacOS/KeePassXC Identifier: KeePassXC Version: ??? Code Type: X86-64 (Native) Parent Process: bash [5523] Responsible: Terminal [2020] User ID: 501 To fix this do this in the terminal. brew cask uninstall keepassxc brew cleanup brew cask install keepassxc Gthub bug report on this issue.
